data.title: Cypress Equity Investments
data.meta_description: Since 2001, CEI successfully purchased and developed over 12,000 multifamily units as well as select retail and office projects amounting to $5 Billion in value.
data.text:
Edge Avenue G is a residential development proximate to both the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail and upcoming Bayonne Ferry Terminal, providing residents with efficient commutes to various employment hubs such as Manhattan, Jersey City, and Newark. Amenities include an expansive double-height entry lobby, multiple co-working spaces with private conference options, fitness center, yoga room, club room spaces with kitchen and lounging options, landscaped courtyard decks, barbecue grills, and on-site storage.

This new community, located on Sunset Boulevard in Los Angeles’ Echo Park neighborhood, benefits from the area’s high walkability and seemingly endless nearby food, drink, and retail destinations. Located only 15-20 minutes from Downtown LA, Glendale, and Hollywood, 2225 Sunset residents will enjoy quick commutes to leading job centers across LA.

The community offers 176 residences and features best-in-class interior finishes. The amenity package includes a spa, indoor/outdoor fitness center, co-working space, and a large roof deck with expansive views of Hollywood and the Downtown skyline.
